Name: LazyLoot
Description:
Roll command with various arguments need | needonly | greed | pass | passall. 
Chat and Toast output and delay for rolling.
ChangeLog:
- Added toggle to show/hide LazyLoot in the Server Info Bar (DTR)
- /lazy test now supports item name or ID and can simulate a roll
- Option to never pass on glamour items (iLvl 1)
- Improved handling of weekly lockouts in Savage duties
- Better handling of unlockable items
- Minor UX improvements
